FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a remote peer.
The undo description command deletes a description for a remote peer.
No remote peer description is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of a remote peer.
The value is a string of 1 to 242 case-sensitive characters, with spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can modify the description of a remote peer only after the remote peer is deleted and a new peer is created. As a result, service traffic is lost. To solve this problem, run the description command to complete the description of the remote peer.
Configuration Impact
If a description has been configured for a remote peer, running the description command overrides the previous description.
